input.description: A whole number indicating the number of elements the loop should have

output.description:
An XML document in this format:
<loops> <loop>1</loop> <loop>2</loop> (any number of iterations) </loops>

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template name="loopincrease"> <xsl:param name="loopcount" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test=". >= $loopcount"> <loop> <xsl:value-of select="$loopcount" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </loop> <xsl:call-template name="loopincrease"> <xsl:with-param name="loopcount" select="$loopcount + 1" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="/"> <loops> <xsl:call-template name="loopincrease"> <xsl:with-param name="loopcount" select="1" /> </xsl:call-template> </loops> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
